description: Amongst the largest man-potable weapons fielded byt he Astra Militarum are thpse crewed by Ordnance Teams.
From bombast field guns that fire heavy shells indirectly, to the multiple warheads of the malleus rocket launcher
or the searing energy lance unleashed by heavy lascannons, such batteries are powerful assets.

equipment.equipment_1: Every model is equipped with: malleus rocket launcher; 2 lasguns; frag grenades.

01.name: Bombast field gun
01.abilities: Blast. This weapon can target units that are not visible to the bearer

wargear_options.01: Any number of models can each have their malleus rocket launcher replaced with one of the following: 1 bombast field gun; 1 heavy lascannon
